original_text: For those seven days, you must not have any yeast in your houses. Whoever eats anything with yeast in it will no longer belong to my people, the Israelites. Everyone must obey these rules, those who live among you as strangers, as well as those who have been born in your land.
korean_text: 이레 동안은 누룩이 너희 집에서 발견되지 아니하도록 하라 무릇 유교물을 먹는 자는 타국인이든지 본국에서 난 자든지를 막론하고 이스라엘 회중에서 끊어지리니

sentences.original_text: you must not have any yeast in your houses.
Whoever eats anything with yeast in it
will no longer belong to my people,
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 내 백성에게 속하지 않을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: those who live among you as strangers,
as well as those who have been born in your land.
